prompt: Design a flat task manager page with a top app bar titled 'Flat Tasks' in bold sans-serif font, a notification icon, a bottom-right FAB with plus icon, scrollable task cards with checkbox, bold title, smaller description, priority badge, due date with calendar icon, three-dot menu, white background, no shadows, coral primary color, and bottom navigation bar with 'Tasks', 'Projects', 'Profile' tabs. Responsive layout emphasizing a flat, shadowless aesthetic.
